title: Tasty treacle tart
description: Treacle tart is a firm favourite when it comes to puddings and serving it with homemade mascarpone ice cream ramps it up a notch. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need an ice cream maker and a 23cm/9in tart tin.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
190g/6¾oz bran flakes, blended to a powder
